attributes.action: End BBC Funding Of Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Petition is to end the wastefull BBC funding of Eurovision song contest
Due to political Voting of European nations 
Public BBC Licence payers Should not be funding such events and should be sponsered by private companies and not the British licence paying Public

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
